name: 在这个世界的尽头，你与我被遗忘的传说（In the world end, You and me the forget's legend）
detailed_description:
This is a outdated RPG of a hero save the world,but this game has had problems since the beginning.
As the protagonist, you will pass the game in a totally different way, the story of this game must exceed your imagination.
This legend will not be remembered which happened in a world that will eventually be forgotten.

Game features:

  • Well-designed BOSS battles require consideration of the timing of various skills.
  • Strange and unexpected plots unfold, short-lived but not boring one-line plot process.
  • No side quest, no maze,no farm, and you can't even get any rewards from the boss battle.
  • Playing this game you won’t have any achievements or any cards. Even if you finished this game, you will not be honored.
  • So why are you come to play this game? If you want to know, you will find the answer in the game.

The author has something to say:

  • I don't have any programming knowledge, so I chose to learn and use RPGmaker.
  • I don't have funds and assistants, but I want to make games, so I chose the most basic material.
  • The only thing I'm good at is storytelling, so the game is designed for this story.
  • I know my game is too rough, but I still want to share it with everyone, so I chose to post it on steam.
  • And, My English is not good, but I will try my best to launch the English version.
  • This game has a production time of 400 hours and a game time of 2 hours.
  • If you think this game is interesting, just buy it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

legal_notice:
The game is made using RPGMAKER MV and its materials.
The auto-save feature uses the OrangeAutoSave script provided by hudell.
The rest of the project is done by the game author alone.
